txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Glossy essences from the Dead in the eastern Lone-lands. Bring them to Hana the Young at Ost Guruth.
'The Lore-master in Brown said that there is magic to be found in this dust. I wonder if it true.\n\n'Thank you.'
'The Lore-master in Brown asked that we collect the essence, a dust-like substance, from the Dead that we defeat. Can you help?'
Hana the Young at Ost Guruth desires glossy essences from the Dead found in the eastern Lone-lands.
Deliver the glossy essences to Hana the Young at Ost Guruth
You accepted a task from Hana the Young to acquire glossy essences from the Dead in the eastern Lone-lands. You can find Hana the Young within Ost Guruth.
Wanted: Glossy essences from the Dead in the eastern Lone-lands.
